content.raw:
Ah true... I was also trying to deselect the object (hide the bounding box), but if the user presses `Ctrl+M` to enter the editor, the object is still selected because the `Ctrl` key is used for multi-selection [here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/83566a92471bcd8c14f561da7cb0e3f81bdf0adb/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc?at=default#cl-915). 

I'll find a way, probably catch `g_editModelAct` inside `GLWidget` and manually deselect...
